full_sentence: I've read this post ten times already. Yes we want all women to feel welxome. I certainly don't know if they actually exhibit hateful feelings towards male counterparts and I would never presume to know what they feel. I used to think that these women married well off powerful white guys and would be that voice on their shoulder to make them more sympathetic to Asian issues. But this line of thinking is so fucked up. Yes they have had a different background to me and sometimes they see me as being nice as flirting but i've realised that so many of them have led very sheltered lives.
Having coronavirus is better than being b@ckward
Greek Council for Refugees is trash, must be run by women

He can call himself anything but not a man. But that doesn't make it real. He can't run with the men. So he tries to run with the women knowing he's stronger and faster, just naturally. Someone needs to tell him what's up. Kid needs a dose of reality
